::Prowl/Zenyak::

The sun was setting. Prowl could feel it. His beast mode, the owl, was a 
nocturnal animal, and as the sun was setting, his excitement was rising.

All of a sudden he stops, signaling Iron Raptor to stop also. Ahead of the 
two maximals, in a clearing, a damaged bot stumbles into view. The symbol on 
his chest clearly showed that he was a predacon and the dents and gashes 
showed that he was damaged.

Prowl hisses silently. "That's Zenyak. Wait here," he says and jumps up, 
grabbing a branch and climbing to the top of the tree that he had been 
standing under.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zenyak's head jerks to the left as he hears some rustling coming from a tree 
nearby, but he relaxes when he sees nothing to cause alarm. He keeps walking 
through the clearing.

When he is about half way through, an owl drops out of the sky, talons 
smashing into Zenyak's shoulders, knocking him unconscious.

Prowl transforms back to robot mode and pulls out his gun, keeping it leveled 
at the predacon's head.
